hypertension.description: High blood pressure condition that increases the risk of heart disease.
hypertension.recommended_diet: DASH diet, high in potassium and low in sodium.

diabetes.description: A metabolic disorder characterized by high blood glucose levels.
diabetes.recommended_diet: Low-glycemic foods, rich in fiber, healthy fats, and lean protein.

heart disease.description: Includes various types of heart conditions, often linked to atherosclerosis.
heart disease.recommended_diet: Mediterranean-style diet, with emphasis on fish, nuts, and whole grains.

asthma.description: Chronic inflammation of the airways that affects breathing.

nutrient_risks.salicylates: may need to be limited in sensitive individuals

asthma.recommended_diet: Anti-inflammatory foods, omega-3 fatty acids, vitamin C and E rich diet.

obesity.description: A condition characterized by excess body fat, increasing risk of other diseases.
obesity.recommended_diet: Calorie-controlled meals, rich in fiber and lean proteins.
